contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name =Xəlilli |settlement_type=Municipality |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Rayon]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Agsu Rayon|Agsu]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of = |population_total =749 |population_footnotes ={{citation needed|date=October 2010}} |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=40 |latm=29 |lats=48 |latNS=N |longd=48|longm=10 |longs=07 |longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xəlilli''' (also, '''Khalilli''', '''Khalli''', and '''Khayli''') is a village and municipality in the [[Agsu Rayon]] of [[Azerbaijan]]. It has a population of 749. == References == {{Reflist}} *{{GEOnet2|32FA88150B483774E0440003BA962ED3}} {{Agsu Rayon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xelilli, Agsu}} [[Category:Populated places in Agsu District]] {{Agsu-geo-stub}}
